item.title: Neovim Config and Cheatsheet
item.description: My config This is my neovim config. It includes configurations for all plugins listed below. If you want to use it you will have to install vim-plug first and then extract the nvim_cfg.zip into ~/.config/nvim/. At lleast at linux systems. Here are some screenshots to get an idea of how it could look like: Plugins This is a list of the most important plugins I’m using quite often: coc: Autocompletion
